title: out8~
description: `out8~` is an octaphonic (8-channel) audio output abstraction for Pure Data, providing click-free control over the DSP engine, mute/unmute, and output gain. It features adjustable ramp times and three scaling modes (quartic, dB, linear) for its internal gain slider, allowing precise control over multi-channel audio output. Users must configure at least 8 audio output channels in their Pure Data preferences.
